prompts: Create a playful Electric-type Pokemon with a cheerful demeanor and bright yellow fur.
Show me a small Pokemon that has a unique black and yellow color combination with big ears.
Imagine a Pokemon that loves to bask in the sun, featuring a bright yellow body and friendly eyes.
Generate an Electric-type Pokemon with distinctive features like long ears and a tail that resembles a lightning bolt.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing an adorable, compact appearance with vibrant colors.
Give me a creature that looks like a small lizard, with a sunny yellow skin and a joyful expression.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of sunny days, using a mix of yellow and black in its design.
